entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather and a wizard. He is unhappy with the headmaster (Dumbledore) and has been trying to make Hogwarts habitable.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who Sirius is unhappy with.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A wizard who appears to have not paid attention to the conversation between Harry and Sirius.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The one who gives reports to Dumbledore and hints that Sirius is in danger.

relationships.description: Sirius is unhappy with the headmaster (Dumbledore).
Sirius dislikes Snape and feels he is not being helpful.
Harry has a lot of affection for his godfather (Sirius).
Mundungus did not pay attention to the conversation between Harry and Sirius.
